D

Database - Class in valerioFarriciello.Model
 
Database() - Constructor for class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Creates a connection between the class and the persistence.xml file by creating an entityManagerFactory
DeleteAPlayer - Class in <Unnamed>
 
DeleteAPlayer() - Constructor for class DeleteAPlayer
 
deleteManager(Manager) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
It will take a manager object that has been selected from the VIEW components and checks if he/she is in a team.
If the team is present, then both the managerID and playerID will be passed to the database object in order
to delete the instance of the manager and set the value managerID inside the team table to null.
deleteManager(String, String) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Delete an instance of Manager and sets the attribute managerID in his/her team (if present) to null
deletePlayer(Player) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
It will take a player object that has been selected from the VIEW components and will find any possible assignment in a team.
In case an assignment is present, then both the playerID and assignmentID will be passed to the database object in order
to be deleted.
deletePlayer(String, int) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Delete an instance of Player and the corresponding (if present) instance of playersAssignment
DeleteTab - Class in valerioFarriciello.View
Class responsible to get the values for the deletion of players, managers and teams
DeleteTab(League) - Constructor for class valerioFarriciello.View.DeleteTab
Generates a gridpane that contains 3 buttons, one to delete a manager, one to delete a team and
another one to delete a player.
deleteTeam(Team) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
Get a team object selected from the VIEW components and then passes it to the database object that will be
in charge of removing all the existing instances in the PlayersAssignment table.
deleteTeam(String) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Deletes an instance of team and its corresponding players assignment from the database
DisplayTab - Class in valerioFarriciello.View
Class responsible to display the values received from the controller
DisplayTab(League) - Constructor for class valerioFarriciello.View.DisplayTab
Generates a gridpane that contains 6 buttons that will display players, managers and teams in different ways.
